title: SAMSUNG 27-Inch Odyssey G3 (G30D) Series FHD Gaming Monitor, 1ms, 180Hz, AMD FreeSync, Adjustable Stand, Black Equalizer, Virtual Aim Point, Eye Saver Mode, Flicker-Free, LS27DG302ENXZA, 2024
description: Samsung's Odyssey G30D Gaming Monitor features 180Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time (MPRT) which enables faster, exhilarating gameplay with ultra-smooth action and minimal blur. AMD Radeon FreeSync™ keeps the monitor and graphics card refresh rate in sync, reducing image tearing for seamless, smooth scenes. Black Equalizer allows you to adjust dark areas in games, letting you spot your enemies in even the darkest hiding nooks. Eye Saver Mode minimizes blue light and reduces irritating screen flicker for more comfortable gaming, and the 3-sided borderless design provides maximum space for bigger, bolder gameplay, enabling a precise dual-monitor setup. Features an ergonomic stand to adjust your monitor height for optimal comfort when playing for extended periods of time.

¹"1 ms" means one millisecond which is the range of avg. response time between 1.00ms to 1.99ms truncated to a whole number. Based on MPRT measured under internal test conditions. Results may vary by content and monitor settings (requires ‘Extreme mode' setting). MPRT (Moving Picture Response Time) measures the time taken for a pixel to transition from one image frame to another (motion blur measurement). Refresh rate may vary by content and input source. ²Images simulated for illustrative purposes.
